articles.description: Known generally by the public as the UK, South Africa, Brazil and India variants, the strains have now been given the letters Alpha, Beta, Gamma, and Delta.
articles.content:

articles.title: WHO switches to Greek alphabet for virus variant names - Eyewitness News
